Name: Relajese con Facundo
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This rum-based cocktail is floral, structured and balanced.
History: Created in 2008 by Adam Elmegirab at Evo-lution Bar Consultancy in Aberdeen, Scotland. The name literally translates from Spanish as 'Relax with Facundo'.
Nutrition: One serving of Relajese con Facundo contains 182 calories
